abstract: Oklahoma's Children, Youth and Family Services Committee approves legislation to protect practice of conversion therapy, practice that seeks to change patient's sexual orientation or gender identity; bill will proceed to House.
lead_paragraph: Legislation that would protect the practice of therapy that seeks to change people’s sexual orientation or gender identity was approved Tuesday by a State House committee.

headline.main: Oklahoma: Bill Intended to Protect ‘Conversion Therapy’ Advances
headline.print_headline: Oklahoma: Bill Intended to Protect ‘conversion Therapy’ Advances

snippet: Legislation that would protect the practice of therapy that seeks to change people’s sexual orientation or gender identity was approved Tuesday by a State House committee.
